intro: This document serves as the Product User Manual for the Copernicus Land Monitoring Service's (CLMS) CLCplus Backbone 2023, a high-resolution (10m) land cover map of Europe. It provides essential information for users seeking to understand and utilise the CLCplus Backbone 2023 product, including detailed descriptions of the 11 land cover classes, technical specifications, auxiliary layers (Raster Data Score Layer, Raster Confidence Layer, and Raster Post-processing Layer), and guidance on its application. The manual also covers the product's lineage, methodology, quality, and terms of use, enabling effective integration into diverse environmental analyses and applications.
